title: Travel Tip: How to Make the Most of a Short Weekend Getaway
body: Even if you only have a weekend, you can still have an amazing trip. I've been finding the best hidden gems and local spots in small cities. Any recommendations for a quick yet memorable escape?

title: How to Make the Most of a Quick 24-Hour Trip
body: If you only had one day to explore a city, how would you spend it? I've been trying to figure out how to get the most out of my short trips. Any tips or recommendations?
